articles.title: Wheel of Fortune's Pat Sajak skewered as 'empty suit' after announcing retirement from game show - Daily Mail
articles.description: A newspaper columnist has devoted his column to slamming Wheel of Fortune game show and its host Pat Sajak who announced his retirement on Monday.
articles.content: A columnist for the San Francisco Chronicle has said 'Pat Sajak is an a******', days after he announced plans to step down from the Wheel of Fortune game show after more than four decades at the helm… [+8916 chars]
